text: The Sorbonne University is a French university located in Paris founded in 2018 as merger of Paris-Sorbonne University and Pierre and Marie Curie University.Sorbonne Université souffle sa première bougie The university provides courses in medicine, science and engineering. Ranked in the top 15 of the best universities in mathematics in the world in the highly reputable QS World University Rankings in 2024, it is also one of the best universities in the country.Sorbonne University == Former Student == * Amadou-Mahtar M'Bow, a Senegalese educator ==References== ==Other websites== * Sorbonne University, official web site Category:2018 establishments in France Category:Universities in Paris
title: Sorbonne University
